items.value: A slaves merchant has arrived at %01@ to sell slaves to the king.
%02@ of %01@ declined the offer of the slaves merchant.
%02@ of %01@ bought %106% slaves from the slaves merchant.
%05@ of %04@ who values liberty is upset by the decision of the king to buy slaves and decided to set the slaves free.
%02@ angered by some governors' decision to set the slaves free decided to execute %05@ of %04@. The citizens were shocked and infuriated by the execution.
